nodes.description: 玻利维亚政府通过信函将Ahmad Vahidi的邀请事件定性为'重大事件'
nodes.support_text: The letter described the invitation to Vahidi as a 'grave incident'

nodes.description: 玻利维亚政府宣布已采取必要措施确保Ahmad Vahidi立即离境
nodes.support_text: the government of Bolivia has taken the corresponding provisions to see to it that Ahmad Vahidi immediately leaves Bolivian territory.
